title: Chelsea Handler cuts a casual figure at Sydney Airport
text:
She's touring Australia with her stand-up comedy show, Life Will Be the Death of Me.

And on Saturday, Chelsea Handler was spotted cutting a casual figure as she jetted into Sydney Airport.

The 44-year-old American comedian and TV star showed off her trim figure in skintight jeans and a T-shirt, after setting the record straight on her feud with Jennifer Aniston.

No laughing matter! Chelsea Handler cut a casual figure as she jetted into Sydney Airport on Saturday... after setting the record straight on her feud with Jennifer Aniston

Chelsea wore black jeans with a grey T-shirt and a tan belt.

She kept comfortable while travelling with white sneakers, and carried a matching white hand bag.

Chelsea was on the go, carrying her phone in her hands and wearing AirPods.

Where to next? Chelsea was on the go, carrying her phone in her hands and wearing AirPods

What feud? It comes after she cleared up rumours of a feud with Hollywood pal, Jennifer Aniston (R)

It comes after she cleared up rumours of a feud with Hollywood pal, Jennifer Aniston.

Appearing on The Project on Thursday, Chelsea confirmed her friendship with the actress is still rock solid.

When asked if they're still friends, Chelsea said: 'We are! We are! Don't read those magazines! Don't believe any of it!'

Chelsea and Jennifer, 50, first became mates after the former Friends star appeared on her late-night talk show Chelsea Lately.

According to Radar Online, their relationship went pear-shaped when Jennifer married her second husband Justin Theroux in 2015.

The two women reportedly buried the hatchet in February this year when Jennifer invited Chelsea to her star-studded 50th birthday party.
description: She's touring Australia with her stand-up comedy show, Life Will Be the Death of Me.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
